titleStmt.title: A short introduction of grammar compiled and set forth for the bringing up of all those that intend to attaine to the knowledge of the Latine tongue.
titleStmt.author: Lily, William, 1468?-1522.
Colet, John, 1467?-1519.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Myles Flesher, Robert Young, and R. Hodgskinson,

notesStmt.note: By William Lily, with contributions by John Colet, Thomas Robertson, and others.
"Brevissima institutio" has separate pagination and title page dated 1637; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
